alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 5:20PM EDT until May 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Southwestern Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 520 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chase City, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kells Corner around 540 PM EDT. Rehoboth around 550 PM EDT. Victoria and Lunenburg around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Fairview, Plantersville, Wilburn, Loves Mill, Fort Mitchell, Finneywood and Wightman. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
